text.section: The board may promulgate all reasonable administrative regulations not inconsistent with this chapter that are necessary to carry into effect the purposes of KRS 17.500 to 17.580 and 17.991.
The board may promulgate administrative regulations requiring mandatory continuing education for approved providers as a condition for obtaining their renewal approvals.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 24, effective April 11, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 606, sec. 147, effective July 15, 1998.
